root: ^and most importantly, continuing your conversation in echocord with the characters.
^Actually, I forgot to mention that you have stats.
^This stats change according to the activities you do,
^so do maintain it~ we never know when you need it.
^I hope this tutorial is helpful enough for you to understand for now.
^If you're wondering what are this stats for...
^You'll maybe find that out in the future ^^
^Ooo and later on, you'll encounter food to choose from in day 2.
^Becareful of what you choose cause it also affect stats.
